answerText: hydrogen [or H] [10] This is the name for the matter, mostly hydrogen, which exists between stars and star clusters. It can be mapped using the twenty-one-centimeter hydrogen line radiation.
heading: Collegiate Novice |2012 | 10 | 7 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This element's alpha emission line is a deep red color, and is part of this gas's Balmer series.  [10] Name this gaseous element, the simplest and most common in the universe.
